https://registrar.umd.edu/grades-records: Undergraduate Contact: Records and Registration Services Graduate Contact: Graduate Degree Clearance Services | Grades FAQs Mid-Term & Final Grades Grading Method Undergraduates can change the grading method in the Registration (Drop/Add) screen throughout the schedule adjustment period. Graduate students can change the grading method in the Registration (Drop/Add) screen up to the last day to drop a graduate course. Graduate students are not eligible for the pass/fail grading option.
